response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth $8,000 to you. Considering the high quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure smooth integration into your business processes. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your organization further. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
